Text: Thanks, KK, but these are the ones I have.  If you u/l the ones in .pdf format I have a program that might convert them.  CP
Great, thanks KK. Any luck in finding any Trevor Scott or Harold Coyle?

Hi KK, I used to love reading this series, years ago!  It reminds me of two other series I used to be in to, The Destroyer (Warren Murphy & Richard Sapir) and the Survivalist (Jerry Ahern).  I'd be over the moon if you could get either of these.  Thanks again!
Thank-you for these and the other books that you take the trouble to U/L. Your efforts are appreciated.
